Name: 多宝修仙
About the game: Heaven and earth are not benevolent, and all things are dogs! A person who cultivates an immortal is a person who changes his life against the sky, and the road to becoming an immortal is even more bumpy and bumpy, very difficult! Fortunately, my human race is a clan of great luck, and after untold hardships, I finally found a chance! 1. The seniors are powerful and hidden in the world, and the red dust experience comes to help. In the world experience, you can find all kinds of hidden masters to accept the bounty quest and get a lot of immortal treasures! 2. All beasts from all walks of life can be subdued, and the road to immortality is no longer lonely. All kinds of rare and exotic beasts encountered during the experience can be subdued and become your own exclusive spiritual pet! 3. The ancient magic weapon is shocking. In the game, you can get a variety of magic weapons, magic weapon special effects and skills have their own merits, transform into a treasured Taoist, and deal with all kinds of things as you like! More ways to play, please look forward to it. I also welcome everyone to join the group to give me advice and suggestions, here I bow! QQ group number, 573413459
